SELECT OH.ORDER_NUMBER,CC.COMPANY_NAME,CC.customer_name,OH.HEADER_ID, OH.ORDER_STATUS,OH.ORDER_DATE,OL.ORDERD_QUANTITY*OL.UNIT_SELLING_PRICE AMOUNT, item.ITEM_CODE,item.ITEM_DESCRIPTION,OL.UNIT_SELLING_PRICE,OL.ORDER_QUANTITY_UOM,OL.ORDERD_QUANTITY, OL.DESCRIPTION,OL.LINE_NUMBER, OL.ADDITION1,OL.ADDITION2,OL.ADDITION3,OL.ADDITION4,OL.ADDITION5 FROM (select company.COMPANY_ID,COMPANY_NUMBER,COMPANY_NAME,customer_id,customer_number,customer_name from hap_org_companys company,hap_ar_customers customer where company.COMPANY_ID=customer.COMPANY_ID) CC, hap_om_order_headers OH, hap_om_order_lines OL, hap_inv_inventory_items item
OH.COMPANY_ID=CC.COMPANY_ID and OH.customer_id=CC.customer_id and OH.header_id=OL.header_id and item.INVENTORY_ITEM_ID=OL.INVENTORY_ITEM_ID and OH.header_id=#{id}
